name: GetTaxRegistrations
description:
Retrieve a list of tax registration objects from Stripe.

Use this tool to get detailed information about tax registrations on Stripe. It returns a list of registration objects that are currently registered.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before
parameters.description: An object ID used as a cursor to define your position in the list for pagination. Use this to fetch the previous page of objects.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: response_fields_to_expand
parameters.description: List of fields to be expanded in the response, allowing for detailed information retrieval.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: object_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of tax registration objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after_object_id
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination. Use the object ID to fetch the next page of the list when applicable.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

parameters.name: tax_registration_status
parameters.description: Specifies the status of the tax registration. Options: active, all, expired, scheduled.

value_schema.description: The status of the Tax Registration.
